description: <k-label> is used to label form fields and sections

props.name: input
props.description: ID of the input element to which the label belongs

props.name: invalid
props.description: Whether the input value is currently invalid

props.name: link
props.description: Sets a link for the label. Link can be absolute or relative.

props.name: required
props.description: Whether a value is required for the input

props.name: type
props.description: Which type the label belongs to
